text: Moosa ne dua ki “Aey hamare Rubb, tu nay Firoun aur uske sardaron ko duniya ki zindagi mein zeenat aur amwal (maal) se nawaz rakkha hai. Aey Rubb! Kya yeh is liye hai ke woh logon ko teri raah se bhatkayein? Aey Rubb, unke maal gharat (obliterate) karde aur unke dilon par aisi mohar karde ke iman na layein jab tak dardnaak azaab na dekh lein”
